channel.title: Jarek Potiuk on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Jarek Potiuk on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: The Silent Symphony: Keeping Airflow's CI/CD and Dev Tools in Tune
item.description: Apache Airflow relies on a silent symphony behind the scenes: its CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery) and development tooling. This presentation explores the critical role these tools play in keeping Airflow efficient and innovative. We’ll delve into how robust CI/CD ensures bug fixes and improvements are seamlessly integrated, while well-maintained development tools empower developers to contribute effectively. Airflow’s power comes from a well-oiled machine â€“ its CI/CD and development tools. This presentation dives into the world of these often-overlooked heroes.
